戈.definition: dagger-axe; abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]; (Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]

戈培爾.definition: Joseph Goebbels (1897-1945), German Nazi leader and politician

戈壁荒灘.definition: barren sands of the Gobi desert

戈比.definition: kopeck (unit of money, one hundredth of ruble) (loanword)

戈氏岩鵐.definition: (bird species of China) Godlewski's bunting (Emberiza godlewskii)

戈氏金絲燕.definition: (bird species of China) Germain's swiftlet (Aerodramus germani)

戈爾.definition: Gore (name); Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate

戈爾巴喬夫.definition: Gorbachev; Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-2022), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995

戈瑞.definition: gray (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)

戈雷.definition: gray (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword) (Tw)
